title: Kuwait owes public entities 2.35 billion dinars, finance ministry says - Reuters
content: Kuwait owes public entities 2.35 billion dinars, finance ministry says  Reuters
description: Kuwait's government owes 2.35 billion dinars ($7.78 billion) in late payments to public entities, according to the finance ministry, in a sign of a deepening cash crunch the oil-exporting nation has faced since the start of the coronavirus pandemic.
